raw_body: Beloved son of late Welikadage William Perera and late Dona Abeysinghe. Beloved husband of late Hemalatha Perera. Father of late Athula Perera, Vipula and Mithula (USA), Father-in-law of Mano and Udayanthi (Udi), Grandfather of Rishantha, Yulani, Nisajith, Devin, Keira, Maneshka, Shanika, Annaka & Seth (USA) passed away.
